name: 楊元森
objective: Learning programming is an efficient way to understand the fundamental of modern computing. This course introduces the basic C and C++ languages, presents fundamentals and illustrates them with short examples of programs. This course covers basic operations of development environment, input/output in console mode, numerical operations, limits and errors, branching, looping, functions, and basic object oriented programming.
schedule:
W1: Getting started with C++
W2: Spreadsheet macros vs. programming
W3: Setting out to C++
W4: Dealing with data and operations
W5: Basic numerical analysis
W6: Compound types
W7: Basic branching and loop
W8: Practices with examples
W9: Midterm
W10: Compound types and examples
W10: Branching and examples
W11: Loops and examples 1
W12: Loops and examples 2
W13: Loops and examples 3
W14: Functions 1
W15: Functions 2
W16: Basic object oriented programming
W17: Practices with examples
W18: Final examination
